children.text: Menu : to access the contents of this app, no logging is required. To create favourites, log in is required
No account yet? Create your account in this app, via the menu tab
Menu : once connected to your account, create favourites for easy access to your preferred content
Home TV : on this screen, you can watch France 24 live TV shows or TV on demand, the latest news bulletins, videos and shows
At any time, go to the News home screen by clicking the blue News button at the bottom of screen
